segments.text: Don't worry . You'll be fine . First of all , put on your seat belt . Adjust the mirrors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't think I'll need the seat belt , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . But it's a good habit to put it on every time you drive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Hold the steering wheel with your hands at ten o'clock and two o'clock .
segments.speaker: S2
